All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AsymmetricEncryptionMethod
    Asymmetric encryption implementation, using RSA.
    AsymmetricEncryptionMethod.AsymmetricAlgorithm
    List of supported asymmetric algorithms and their key pair size.
    ConflictingAsymmetricEncryptionAlgorithmsException
    Exception thrown when the given key pair corresponding asymmetric encryption algorithm does not match the desired algorithm to use.
    ConflictingEncryptionAlgorithmsException
    Abstract exception for conflicting encryption algorithm (when the given key corresponding algo does not match the desired algo).
    ConflictingSymmetricEncryptionAlgorithmsException
    Exception thrown when the given secret key corresponding symmetric encryption algorithm does not match the desired algorithm to use.
    CrypDecryptTest  
    Encryptable
    Interface to implement when a class needs to be encryptable.
    EncryptableString
    String wrapping class providing the ability to encrypt/decrypt a string.
    EncryptionAlgorithm
    Interface defining a contract for an enumeration of encryption algorithms (symmetric or asymmetric).
    EncryptionMethod
    This abstract class wraps a cipher, allows to serialize/deserialize objects, and defines methods to encrypt/decrypt objects (to be implemented by child classes).
    NotEncryptableException
    Exception thrown when trying to serialize an object that does not implement the Encryptable interface.
    SampleEncryptableObject  
    SymmetricEncryptionMethod
    Symmetric encryption implementation, using AES.
    SymmetricEncryptionMethod.SymmetricAlgorithm
    List of supported symmetric algorithms and their secret key size.
    WrongSymmetricKeySizeException
    Exception thrown when trying to instantiate a SymmetricEncryptionMethod with a secret key not matching the required algorithm key size (in bits).
